ygData.subject: Looking for spellcomponents

ygData.messageBody:
I play a level 29 Magician named Eldran on Cazic Thule. In order to do my
research I was looking for components. The problem I encountered was that
the components needed are very rare which I think put Magicians at a
disadvantage when it comes to research. In all my travels I have not come
across a single spell component besides words. I think they should either
increase the spawn rate for these items or, which would be even better, put
a vendor, maybe a bit out of the way, into the game that sells these
components. Another suggestion I believe that should be considered is to
make the necro and mage words look different. I plan on starting a petition
towards this end and would apprerciate any hints or suggestions towards
this.

PS: If anybody can give me a hint where to find these components or has some
to sell that would also be greatly appreciated.

Eldran
